textBeforeTable: Recipe of Dosakaya pachadi Cucumber pickle Description mins Preparation Time Cucumber Main Ingredient 1 hour Cooking Time February 06, 2008 Published 0 persons Servings Sirisha Author 0 reviews so far Rate the recipe --> February 06, 2008 Sirisha 0 Dosakaya pachadi Cucumber pickle My Recipebox: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
textAfterTable: Directions Take a cucumber and cut a small portion of it and taste to see it is not bitter. Wash it and wipe neatly (there shouldn#39;t be a drop of water on it). Cut it into small cubes (do not peel the cucumber). To the cucumber cubes (remove seeds) add chilli pdr, mustard pdr, methi pdr, salt, garlic cloves (slightly mash them) and mix them nicely. Heat oil and add to this mixture. Ground nut oil tastes good. Mix all the ingredients properly and keep in adry jar and rest it for a day. It stays for 2 weeks and tastes like mango pickle. Tastes good with upma, rice, chapathi, dosa etc. About Recipe Recipe Tips
